        var Phaser;
        (function (Phaser) {
          var Basic = (function () {
            function Basic(game) {
              this.name = 'Space Harrier';
              this._game = game;
              this.ID = -1;
              this.exists = true;
              this.active = true;
            }
            Basic.prototype.destroy = 
            function () {
            };
            // Code Comment        
            Basic.prototype.toString = 
            function () {
              return "";
            };
            return Basic;
          })();
          Phaser.Basic = Basic;
        })(Phaser || (Phaser = {}));
